data.headline: Passionate UX Designer with a Diverse Background
data.summary: Experienced UX designer with a background in marketing, transitioning to the tech industry with a strong focus on user-centric design.

experience.title: Marketing Specialist
bullets: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and execute successful marketing campaigns.
Conducted market research and analyzed customer data to identify trends and insights.
Designed engaging visuals and content for various marketing channels, including social media and email.

experience.title: UX Designer
bullets: Partnered with product managers and developers to create user-friendly digital experiences.
Conducted user research, including interviews, usability testing, and persona development.
Designed and iterated on wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups.
Collaborated with the design team to ensure consistent branding and design system implementation.

projects.name: Eco-friendly Packaging Design
projects.description: Designed a sustainable packaging solution for a leading organic cosmetics brand, incorporating user feedback and environmental considerations.

projects.name: Mobile App for Fitness Enthusiasts
projects.description: Collaborated with a cross-functional team to create a user-friendly mobile app that helps fitness enthusiasts track their workouts and progress.

interests: Exploring new design trends and technologies
data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Sophia is smiling and wearing a smart casual outfit, with a clean background that highlights her as the focal point.
